value:
$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|What's wrong with you lot?! Have
you all lost your fighting spirit?
...You dare call yourselves pirates?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ギース,ch02_26_Geese_M_Pirate20,Face|Harsh. It's not exactly like I became
a pirate by choice...$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|Same here. I was finally able to leave
the pirate's life behind me thanks
to Prince Marth, but...now this.$k$pA festival. For pirates.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|...Just to be clear, I don't target just
anyone who happens to wander too
close. I have reasons for what I do.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|This is going to be a sad excuse for
a pirate festival if the best we've
got to offer are you sorry set.$k$pIs that all right with you? Shouldn't
REAL pirates show the people what
it means to be a pirate?$k$pIn the spirit of the pirate festival,
of course...$k$pThe authenticity of the atmosphere
is resting on your shoulders!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|And how do ye suggest we show
them what it means to be a pirate?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|Easy. We'll enter and win
the festival tournament!$k$pThey say there's treasure in it for
the winner. I'm planning to give my
share to those in need.$k$pYou're welcome to do whatever
you please with the winnings,
of course.$k$pWhatever you end up doing,
some good is sure to come
from it, don't you agree?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ギース,ch02_26_Geese_M_Pirate20,Face|I get it. With this treasure, I can
pursue my real dream, right?
In that case, I'm with you.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|If it'll help people enjoy the festival,
that may well count as bringin' some
good back into the world...$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|Treasure is of no interest to me, but
a good battle is a different story...$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ブリギッド,ch06_25_Brigid_F_Pirate20,Face|Then it's decided! Let's go teach
them the meaning of pirate!$k$p

$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|A dress-up festival is great and all,
but...let me give you a taste of the
laguz take on festivities. Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|Both a king AND a pirate? This guy
is unlike anyone I've ever met...
Glad he's on my team.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_海賊ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Pirate20,Face|We're not making any headway...
Retreat for now!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ダロス,ch01_42_Daros_M_Pirate20,Face|A-aye!$k$p$Sbs150|
